text: Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba, nimen she an la er qidao di naxie pei zhu, zenme ying shou chongbai ne? Nimen gaosu wo ba! Tamen ceng duzi chuangzaole da di de na yibufen ne? Haishi tamen ceng yu an la gongtong chuangzao zhu tian ne? Haishi an la ceng shouyu tamen yi ben jingdian, er tamen shi yiju na ben jingdian zhong de xuduo mingzheng ne?” Buran, bu yi zhe jin yi qipian huxiang ying xu
